issue.title: [Java] Efficiently compute hash code for ArrowBufPointer
issue.body:
***Note**: This issue was originally created as [ARROW-6030](https://issues.apache.org/jira/browse/ARROW-6030). Please see the [migration documentation](https://gist.github.com/toddfarmer/12aa88361532d21902818a6044fda4c3) for further details.*

### Original Issue Description:
As ArrowBufHasher is introduced, we can compute the hash code of a continuous region within an ArrowBuf. 

We optimize the process to make it efficient to avoid recomputation.
